attributes.additional_details: Improve the quality of Battersea Park through Rewilding. By closing the park for (a minimum of) five years this petition aims to restore desperate or entirely lost ecosystems and wildlife. Letting natural processes take their course is cost-effective and has the potential to transform Battersea Park into a space with a healthy land- as well as soundscape that can once again be enjoyed by visitors and residents alike.

rejection.details: Battersea Park is the responsibility of Wandsworth Borough Council and you may wish to refer your request to it as the relevant authority.
